major_00_fool.title: The Fool

meaning.general: A fresh start invites openness and experimentation.
meaning.light: Optimism and curiosity are helping you move forward.
meaning.shadow: Naivety or avoidance could blur the risks.
meaning.advice: Take a small step that keeps the door open to learning.
meaning.detailed: You are at the edge of a new road, and you do not need all the answers. Start with one small step, but keep a plan for shelter and money. If someone pushes you to leap, ask what safety net they offer. Your freedom grows when you choose curiosity with responsibility.

major_00_fool.funFact: In many traditions the Fool is numbered zero, the start of the journey.

major_01_magician.title: The Magician

meaning.general: You already have tools available to shape the outcome.
meaning.light: Aligned intention makes your efforts more effective.
meaning.shadow: Scattered energy may dilute your impact.
meaning.advice: Choose one priority and direct your attention there.
meaning.detailed: Your tools are on the table; use them instead of waiting. Focus on one goal and gather the right supplies. Speak clearly about what you want so others can help. If you try to impress, you will waste power.

major_01_magician.funFact: The Magician often points one hand up and one down to link above and below.

major_02_high_priestess.title: The High Priestess

meaning.general: Quiet insight is available beneath the surface.
meaning.shadow: Keeping too much hidden can create distance.
meaning.advice: Give yourself space to listen before acting.
meaning.detailed: Quiet knows more than noise. Wait, observe, and collect the truth before acting. If someone hides something, you can sense it, but do not force it open. Trust your inner rules and protect your boundaries.

major_02_high_priestess.funFact: Her scroll is often labeled TORA to hint at hidden knowledge.

major_03_empress.title: The Empress

meaning.general: Supportive conditions allow something to grow.
meaning.light: Care and patience are strengthening your foundation.
meaning.advice: Nourish what matters most and simplify the rest.
meaning.detailed: Care is work, not just a feeling. Feed what you want to grow and cut what drains you. Pleasure is allowed if it is balanced and paid for. Create a routine that supports your body and your home.

major_03_empress.funFact: She is usually surrounded by wheat, a sign of harvest and abundance.

major_04_emperor.title: The Emperor

meaning.general: Clear structure helps you move with confidence.
meaning.advice: Define boundaries that support your priorities.
meaning.detailed: Order brings safety when it is fair. Set clear rules and keep them yourself. This is a time to handle paperwork, money, and decisions directly. Do not confuse control with respect.

major_04_emperor.funFact: His throne is commonly carved with rams for Aries.

major_05_hierophant.title: The Hierophant

meaning.general: Guidance from trusted sources can be helpful.
meaning.light: Shared values offer a steady compass.
meaning.shadow: Following rules blindly can limit growth.
meaning.advice: Seek mentors, but adapt advice to your reality.
meaning.detailed: Tradition can guide you if you choose it wisely. Ask a mentor or follow a proven method for now. The card warns against empty rituals with no heart. Commit to the values you claim.

major_05_hierophant.funFact: The raised fingers are a classic teaching gesture.

major_06_lovers.title: The Lovers

meaning.general: A meaningful choice asks for alignment with values.
meaning.shadow: Avoiding a decision can create tension.
meaning.advice: Name what matters most and choose accordingly.
meaning.detailed: Love is a choice and a responsibility. Be honest about what you want and what you can give. If there are two paths, choose the one that matches your values. Do not promise more than you can sustain.

major_06_lovers.funFact: Early decks often showed a choice scene, not only romance.

major_07_chariot.title: The Chariot

meaning.general: Focused effort creates forward momentum.
meaning.advice: Move steadily and keep your intention clear.
meaning.detailed: You can win if you steer with discipline. Keep your emotions in check and drive toward one target. Outside voices will pull you; answer only to your plan. Victory comes from control, not force.

major_07_chariot.funFact: The charioteer is often shown without reins to show willpower.

major_08_strength.title: Strength

meaning.general: Inner steadiness is more powerful than force.
meaning.light: Patience and empathy help you hold the moment.
meaning.advice: Lead with kindness, and trust your endurance.
meaning.detailed: Gentle power tames the wild. Speak calmly, but do not allow disrespect. This is about patience, not weakness. You gain more by steady care than by shouting.

major_08_strength.funFact: The infinity symbol above her head points to inner mastery.

major_09_hermit.title: The Hermit

meaning.general: Solitude offers perspective and clarity.
meaning.light: Intentional reflection reveals the next step.
meaning.shadow: Withdrawing too far can reduce support.
meaning.advice: Take quiet time, then return with a plan.
meaning.detailed: Step back so you can hear yourself. Solitude helps you sort what matters from noise. Keep your light small and steady, not flashy. When you return, bring a clear answer.

major_09_hermit.funFact: The lantern is a symbol of personal guidance.

major_10_wheel_of_fortune.title: Wheel of Fortune

meaning.general: Circumstances are shifting in meaningful ways.
meaning.light: Good timing can open a helpful window.
meaning.shadow: Feeling out of control may cloud decisions.
meaning.advice: Notice the cycle you are in and respond calmly.
meaning.detailed: Change is moving; you cannot stop it. Keep flexible and prepare for the next turn. When luck rises, save something for later. When luck dips, keep doing the basics.

major_10_wheel_of_fortune.funFact: Many wheels include a sphinx to represent riddles of fate.

major_11_justice.title: Justice

meaning.general: Balance and honesty clarify the situation.
meaning.light: Clear choices bring integrity and calm.
meaning.advice: Weigh facts and values before deciding.
meaning.detailed: Balance your actions with the results. Be precise with words, contracts, and promises. If you owe something, pay it. If you are wronged, seek a fair process, not revenge.

major_11_justice.funFact: Justice is one of the few cards that faces forward directly.

major_12_hanged_man.title: The Hanged Man

meaning.general: A pause can shift how you see the issue.
meaning.light: Letting go invites a new perspective.
meaning.shadow: Stagnation may feel like being stuck.
meaning.advice: Release urgency and allow insight to emerge.
meaning.detailed: Pause and look from a new angle. What feels stuck may be asking for a sacrifice. Release the need to be right so you can learn. This is a time to wait with purpose.

major_12_hanged_man.funFact: He hangs by one foot to show willing surrender.

major_13_death.title: Death

meaning.general: An ending clears space for a new chapter.
meaning.advice: Acknowledge what is complete and turn forward.
meaning.detailed: An ending clears space for the next chapter. Do not cling to what is already gone. Clean up, say goodbye, and move on. Renewal comes after you let the old fall away.

major_13_death.funFact: The card usually speaks of transition, not literal death.

major_14_temperance.title: Temperance

meaning.general: Steady blending creates harmony over time.
meaning.advice: Aim for small adjustments rather than extremes.
meaning.detailed: Mix with care; extreme choices will spill. Take the middle road and keep your habits steady. Healing takes time, so do not rush it. Small daily balance beats dramatic change.

major_14_temperance.funFact: The angel pours between two cups to show blending.

major_15_devil.title: The Devil

meaning.general: A pattern or attachment wants your attention.
meaning.advice: Name the pattern and choose one way to loosen it.
meaning.detailed: Desire can become a chain if you feed it blindly. Name what controls you and reduce it. Pleasure is fine when it is honest and limited. Break the habit before it breaks you.

major_15_devil.funFact: The figures are loose, suggesting they could walk away.

major_16_tower.title: The Tower

meaning.general: A reset clears away what no longer holds.
meaning.light: Honest change makes room for growth.
meaning.advice: Stay grounded and rebuild with what remains true.
meaning.detailed: A sudden shake clears weak foundations. Do not try to keep a structure that is already cracked. Tell the truth and accept the fallout. After the dust, you can build stronger.

major_16_tower.funFact: Lightning is a common symbol of sudden insight.

major_17_star.title: The Star

meaning.general: A calm sense of hope is returning.
meaning.advice: Focus on what brings steadiness and ease.
meaning.detailed: Hope returns when you keep your heart open. Do the simple, healing acts and trust the process. Share your gift quietly without chasing applause. The future grows from steady faith.

major_17_star.funFact: The Star follows the Tower in order, signaling renewal.

major_18_moon.title: The Moon

meaning.general: The situation is unclear, but insight is possible.
meaning.shadow: Anxiety might amplify what is unknown.
meaning.advice: Take things slowly and verify assumptions.
meaning.detailed: Not everything is as it seems; check the facts. Your intuition is active, but fear can distort it. Move slowly and avoid big commitments right now. Night questions need morning answers.

major_18_moon.funFact: The dog and wolf together show tame and wild instincts.

major_19_sun.title: The Sun

meaning.general: Clarity brings warmth and forward movement.
meaning.light: Optimism helps you see the path ahead.
meaning.advice: Celebrate progress while staying attentive.
meaning.detailed: Clarity is strong and warm. Show yourself plainly and let joy lead. Success comes from honest effort, not shortcuts. Celebrate, but keep your feet on the ground.

major_19_sun.funFact: The child on the horse symbolizes simple happiness.

major_20_judgement.title: Judgement

meaning.general: A clear review points to a renewed direction.
meaning.light: Learning from the past supports a wise choice.
meaning.advice: Assess honestly, then commit to a fresh start.
meaning.detailed: A call is arriving; answer it. Review your past and take responsibility for choices. Forgive what can be forgiven, then act. This is a chance to reset your direction.

major_20_judgement.funFact: The trumpet imagery echoes a final awakening.

major_21_world.title: The World

meaning.general: Completion brings a sense of wholeness.
meaning.light: You are ready to integrate what you have learned.
meaning.advice: Honor the finish and define the next horizon.
meaning.detailed: A cycle completes; recognize what you achieved. Close the loop and share your result. If you want a new goal, finish the old one first. You are more capable than you think.

major_21_world.funFact: The laurel wreath is a sign of victory and completion.

wands_00_knight.title: Knight of Wands

meaning.general: Momentum surges and you feel ready to move.
meaning.advice: Channel the rush into a focused aim.
meaning.detailed: Action wants to move fast, but speed needs control. Focus your energy on one mission. Impatience can start fights or burn bridges. Set a deadline and honor it.

wands_00_knight.funFact: The knight is often paired with the salamander, a symbol of fire.

wands_01_king.title: King of Wands

meaning.general: Lead with clear vision and steady fire.
meaning.advice: Lead with warmth and integrity.
meaning.detailed: Lead with vision and steady courage. People follow when you are consistent. Do not bully or demand loyalty without earning it. Protect your team and your reputation.

wands_01_king.funFact: His cloak commonly shows salamanders biting their tails.

wands_02_queen.title: Queen of Wands

meaning.general: Confidence and creative warmth draw support.
meaning.advice: Share your light without dimming yourself.
meaning.detailed: Confidence and warmth attract support. Use your influence to lift others, not to show off. Keep your boundaries clear and your promises kept. Your creativity works best with a schedule.

wands_02_queen.funFact: She often holds a sunflower as a sign of optimism.

wands_03_page.title: Page of Wands

meaning.general: A fresh idea or message sparks interest.
meaning.advice: Follow the spark and test it.
meaning.detailed: A spark is here; learn how to feed it. Start with practice, not perfection. If you get bored, return to the basics and keep going. Curiosity is your fuel.

wands_03_page.funFact: Pages in tarot often represent messages or apprentices.

wands_04_two.title: Two of Wands

meaning.general: You stand at a threshold with options.
meaning.advice: Choose a direction and take the first step.
meaning.detailed: You are planning your next move, so be honest about what you want. Compare options but do not wait forever. Make a map and then step out. Personal power grows when you choose.

wands_04_two.funFact: He holds a small globe to show the world as possibility.

wands_05_three.title: Three of Wands

meaning.general: Progress grows as you look outward.
meaning.advice: Keep moving; your reach is widening.
meaning.detailed: Your first effort is working; now expand. Look outward and build partnerships. Keep your standards and do not accept weak offers. Progress comes from steady follow-through.

wands_05_three.funFact: The figure looks out to sea, a classic symbol of trade.

wands_06_four.title: Four of Wands

meaning.general: A pause to celebrate and anchor.
meaning.advice: Honor what is steady and shared.
meaning.detailed: Pause to celebrate what is stable. Rest is not laziness; it is preparation. Invite support and keep your home base strong. Gratitude keeps success from turning sour.

wands_06_four.funFact: The four wands form a canopy like a simple ritual arch.

wands_07_five.title: Five of Wands

meaning.general: Different forces clash and spark.
meaning.advice: Focus the energy on a shared goal.
meaning.detailed: Competition is noisy; stay focused. Choose which battles are worth your energy. Clear rules prevent chaos. Practice turns conflict into skill.

wands_07_five.funFact: Many readers see it as a mock fight or training.

wands_08_six.title: Six of Wands

meaning.general: Effort is noticed and rewarded.
meaning.advice: Celebrate, then keep it grounded.
meaning.detailed: Recognition arrives, but stay humble. Accept praise and keep working. Your success can inspire others if you share the credit. Do not let pride stop improvement.

wands_08_six.funFact: The laurel wreath is a traditional sign of victory.

wands_09_seven.title: Seven of Wands

meaning.general: Stand your ground for what matters.
meaning.advice: Hold firm without closing off.
meaning.detailed: Stand your ground with calm confidence. You may be outnumbered, but your position is strong. Protect your boundaries and keep your plan simple. Courage grows with consistency.

wands_09_seven.funFact: The high ground signals advantage despite pressure.

wands_10_eight.title: Eight of Wands

meaning.general: Things move quickly and align.
meaning.advice: Ride the momentum with focus.
meaning.detailed: Things move quickly; be ready. Respond to messages promptly and follow through. Do not overpromise when speed is high. Keep your target clear.

wands_10_eight.funFact: Flying wands suggest momentum and swift travel.

wands_11_nine.title: Nine of Wands

meaning.general: You are close to the finish; stay steady.
meaning.advice: Rest, then hold the line.
meaning.detailed: You are tired but still standing. Guard what you have earned and take care of your body. Do not let old wounds make you harsh. A final push is possible with rest.

wands_11_nine.funFact: The bandage hints at past battles, not defeat.

wands_12_ten.title: Ten of Wands

meaning.general: Responsibilities feel heavy.
meaning.advice: Delegate and set limits.
meaning.detailed: Too many duties are crushing you. Put down what is not yours. Ask for help and set limits. Real strength knows when to simplify.

wands_12_ten.funFact: The figure can barely see ahead, showing the burden.

wands_13_ace.title: Ace of Wands

meaning.general: A new spark of passion arrives.
meaning.advice: Take the first step and nurture it.
meaning.detailed: A clean spark starts a new fire. Say yes to initiative and take the first step. Keep your focus narrow and practical. Energy grows when you act, not when you wait.

wands_13_ace.funFact: A hand from a cloud presents the wand as a gift.

cups_00_knight.title: Knight of Cups

meaning.general: A tender offer approaches, led by feeling more than plan.
meaning.advice: Accept the offer only if it comes with steady actions.
meaning.detailed: He rides with a full heart and soft words, but the road still matters. Let sweetness be proven by consistency. If the invitation feels real, let it in, but keep your eyes open.

cups_00_knight.funFact: Traditional decks show the knight moving slowly to signal calm devotion.

cups_01_king.title: King of Cups

meaning.general: Maturity of heart asks you to lead with calm.
meaning.shadow: Emotions held too tightly can turn distant.
meaning.advice: Be kind, but keep your boundaries clear.
meaning.detailed: This king knows the waves but does not drown in them. Your feelings are real, yet they must be guided. Speak gently and act firmly, and others will trust your steadiness.

cups_01_king.funFact: The king sits on a throne surrounded by water, a sign of calm amid emotion.

cups_02_queen.title: Queen of Cups

meaning.general: Deep sensitivity reveals what is unspoken.
meaning.shadow: Absorbing too much can drain you.
meaning.advice: Offer comfort while protecting your energy.
meaning.detailed: The queen listens with her whole spirit, so be honest with yourself. Your intuition is sharp, but do not carry everyone else's sorrow. Give care where it is welcomed and keep your cup full.

cups_02_queen.funFact: Her cup is often closed, symbolizing private intuition.

cups_03_page.title: Page of Cups

meaning.general: A gentle surprise or message stirs the heart.
meaning.advice: Receive the message, then respond with care.
meaning.detailed: This page brings a small offering and a wide-eyed heart. Let yourself feel, but do not rush to declare. Curiosity is sweet when it is paired with patience.

cups_03_page.funFact: The fish peeking from the cup hints at unexpected inspiration.

cups_04_two.title: Two of Cups

meaning.general: A mutual bond asks to be honored.
meaning.shadow: Imbalance or dependence can creep in.
meaning.advice: Choose partnership that respects both hearts.
meaning.detailed: Two cups meet as equals, not as saviors. A good bond strengthens both sides and does not erase self. Keep the exchange balanced and the respect steady.

cups_04_two.funFact: This card echoes a sacred agreement, not just romance.

cups_05_three.title: Three of Cups

meaning.general: Community lifts the spirit.
meaning.advice: Celebrate with those who truly care.
meaning.detailed: Laughter is medicine, so accept the invitation. Your people want to hold you up, and you can do the same for them. Keep the circle clean and the kindness honest.

cups_05_three.funFact: The three figures raise cups in a simple toast of unity.

cups_06_four.title: Four of Cups

meaning.general: Disinterest hides a choice you are avoiding.
meaning.light: Taking space to reconsider what you want.
meaning.shadow: Missing a gift while staring at what is not.
meaning.advice: Look again, and choose with intention.
meaning.detailed: You sit with crossed arms, but the offer is still there. Rest if you need it, yet do not reject help out of habit. Name what you truly want before you decide.

cups_06_four.funFact: The offered cup appears from a cloud, symbolizing a quiet blessing.

cups_07_five.title: Five of Cups

meaning.general: Loss is present, but not all is gone.
meaning.advice: Mourn what passed, then notice what remains.
meaning.detailed: Your eyes are on the spilled cups, and that is human. Still, two cups stand, waiting for you to turn. Let grief move through you, then gather what is left.

cups_07_five.funFact: The bridge in the image reminds you there is a way forward.

cups_08_six.title: Six of Cups

meaning.general: Past sweetness returns to soften the moment.
meaning.shadow: Living in the past can stall growth.
meaning.advice: Take the warmth, then keep moving.
meaning.detailed: A familiar scent or story may return you to kinder days. Let it comfort you, but do not let it trap you. Carry the lesson forward with a soft heart.

cups_08_six.funFact: This card often signals a childhood memory resurfacing.

cups_09_seven.title: Seven of Cups

meaning.general: Many options shimmer, and not all are true.
meaning.advice: Choose what is real, not what only sparkles.
meaning.detailed: The cups show dreams and dangers together. Take time to sort the real from the glitter. One clear choice is worth more than seven half wishes.

cups_09_seven.funFact: Each cup holds a different symbol of desire or fear.

cups_10_eight.title: Eight of Cups

meaning.general: It may be time to leave what no longer feeds you.
meaning.advice: Go toward what is true, even if it is quiet.
meaning.detailed: You have enough, yet your soul is still hungry. This is not failure, it is honesty. Walk away with respect and let the next chapter find you.

cups_10_eight.funFact: The moon in the card marks a journey guided by intuition.

cups_11_nine.title: Nine of Cups

meaning.general: A wish comes close, and gratitude steadies it.
meaning.advice: Enjoy the reward, but keep humility.
meaning.detailed: You have earned a warm seat at the table. Give thanks and share your plenty, and the blessing will last. Do not let comfort make you careless.

cups_11_nine.funFact: This card is often called the wish card.

cups_12_ten.title: Ten of Cups

meaning.general: Harmony grows when hearts align.
meaning.light: Peace at home and emotional fulfillment.
meaning.shadow: Unrealistic perfection can crack the bond.
meaning.advice: Protect the harmony with honest care.
meaning.detailed: Joy is sweetest when it is shared and steady. The rainbow is a promise, but it still needs daily kindness. Keep showing up for those you love.

cups_12_ten.funFact: The rainbow of cups symbolizes emotional completion.

cups_13_ace.title: Ace of Cups

meaning.general: A new wave of feeling rises.
meaning.advice: Open your heart, but keep your feet on the ground.
meaning.detailed: The cup overflows, and so does your intuition. Let the feeling in, then shape it with gentle action. This is a beginning, not the whole story.

cups_13_ace.funFact: In many decks a dove delivers the cup, a sign of grace.
